answer: Our Margherita Pizza is a classic Neapolitan style with San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh buffalo mozzarella, and basil.
The Pepperoni Pizza is a crowd favorite, featuring our house-made spicy pepperoni and melted mozzarella.
The Caesar Salad is fresh with crisp romaine, shaved parmesan, and garlic buttery croutons.
We are open from 11 AM to 10 PM daily.
We accept all major credit cards, Apple Pay, and cash.
